cs63

Class Pile

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • cs63.Pile

  • public class Pile
extends Actor
    A pile of 0 or more cards. The most recently added card is fully visible, while the other cards are partially covered.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int Y_OFFSET
      The vertical distance in pixels between adjacent cards in a pile.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pile(int x, int y)
      Constructs an empty pile of cards.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCard(Card card)
      Adds a card to the top of the pile, partially covering the prior card (if there is a prior card).
      boolean hasCards()
      Checks whether this pile has cards.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks whether this pile is empty.
      Card peekAtTopCard()
      Gets the top card, without modifying the pile.
      Card removeTopCard()
      Gets the top card, removing it from the pile and fully exposing the next card, if one exists.

      • Methods inherited from class greenfoot.Actor

        act, addedToWorld, getImage, getIntersectingObjects, getNeighbours, getObjectsAtOffset, getObjectsInRange, getOneIntersectingObject, getOneObjectAtOffset, getRotation, getWorld, getX, getY, intersects, isAtEdge, isTouching, move, removeTouching, setImage, setImage, setLocation, setRotation, turn, turnTowards

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • Y_OFFSET

        public static final int Y_OFFSET
        The vertical distance in pixels between adjacent cards in a pile.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pile

        public Pile(int x,
            int y)
        Constructs an empty pile of cards.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the center of the Pile
        y - the y-coordinate of the top of the Pile

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks whether this pile is empty.
        Returns:
        true if the pile is empty, false otherwise

      • hasCards

        public boolean hasCards()
        Checks whether this pile has cards.
        Returns:
        true if the pile has cards, false if it is empty

      • peekAtTopCard

        public Card peekAtTopCard()
        Gets the top card, without modifying the pile. If the pile is empty, this returns null.
        Returns:
        the top card

      • addCard

        public void addCard(Card card)
        Adds a card to the top of the pile, partially covering the prior card (if there is a prior card). The pile of cards grows vertically, with a distance of Y_OFFSET between one card and the next.
        Parameters:
        card - the card to add

      • removeTopCard

        public Card removeTopCard()
        Gets the top card, removing it from the pile and fully exposing the next card, if one exists. This will throw an exception if called when the pile is empty.
        Returns:
        the top card
